channel.title: [BETA] KarmaPK! [728] Full World PvP! Eco!
channel.description:
Hello! This is Admin Dylan here advertising KarmaPK! This server has full world PvP, Semi Working GE (Can buy from but can't sell to, We are working on this.) So while skilling and training there is ALWAYS a risk. The brightside is only people within 10 levels of your level can attack you so its not like a level 138 can come on hit you. We thought this was a one of a kind idea and right now the only way to really make money is at Polypore dungeon (::polypore) and by woodcutting trees for fist of guthix tokens to sell at a store at Lumby castle! If you have any problems while online PM Max, Skyrim or me Dylan!
The website is under construction but the webclient is there!: http://karmapk.com/
Hope you see you online!
Screenshots:
Corp: http://gyazo.com/a56828880c0a43d0e2d12bd102e1e68f
QBD: http://gyazo.com/692f7fa05dfca11081d741a5c733871e
Bandos: http://gyazo.com/2e5befdbd62fd58584fef1c6aff91f4e
